title: Washer and Dryer Included, Hot Tub, $1,500 OFF Move In Cost
posting_body: ['The Epicenter of Luxury & convenience', 'Come to Wood Creek Apartments and be one with nature in beautiful Pleasant Hill.', 'Our community lies adjacent to JFK University, but maintains a peaceful feel that makes it seem as though you are far-removed from school, work and the bustle of busy streets.', "Wood Creek's newly renovated homes feature Energy Efficient appliances, new hard surface flooring, a cozy fireplace, built-in shelving, and a serene pond just steps from your door.", "But just because you're looking for tranquility doesn't mean you have to go without urban convenience.", 'Hop on the BART and jet off to San Francisco, or spend the day shopping and exploring nearby Sun Valley Mall.', 'No matter what adventure you choose, Wood Creek makes it easy to unwind at home after a long day.', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 63', 'OR Text', '63', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1019 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Spacious Patio or Balcony', '- Ample Storage', '- Washer and Dryer Included', '- Wood Look Flooring', '- Refrigerator', '- Large Windows', '- Central Air Conditioning', '- Garage Included with Every Apartment Home!', '- Pond Views*', '- Wood Burning Fireplace', '- Built-in Shelving*', '- Ceiling Fan*', '- Dishwasher', '- Microwave', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', 'Community Amenities', '- Playground', '- Hot Tub', '- BBQ Grill', '- On-site Maintenance', '- Swimming Pool', '- Fitness Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Max 2 Allowed | Max weight 40 lb each', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Sunday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wood Creek Apartments', '637 Stonebridge Way, Pleasant Hill, CA, 94523', 'gHt9OheGW2uV']
